## RepeatDirective.createBehavior() method

Creates a behavior for the provided target node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createBehavior(target: Node): RepeatBehavior<TSource>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | Node | The node instance to create the behavior for. |

<b>Returns:</b>
